mapper.select:
SELECT a.`id`, a.`uuid`, a.`name`, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, a.`parent_uuid` AS `parentUuid`, a.`level` FROM team a JOIN user_team b ON a.`uuid` = b.`team_uuid` AND b.`user_uuid` = #{userUuid} AND a.`level` in
#{level}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`uuid`, a.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `team` WHERE `parent_uuid` = a.`uuid`) as `childCount`, a.`parent_uuid` as `parentUuid`, a.`lft`, a.`rht`, a.`level` FROM `team` a WHERE a.`uuid` = #{uuid} and a.`is_delete` = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `team` WHERE `uuid` = #{uuid} and `is_delete` = 0

SELECT `id`, `uuid`, `name`, `parent_uuid` AS parentUuid, `level`, `lft`, `rht`, `is_delete` AS isDelete, `upward_uuid_path` AS upwardUuidPath, `upward_name_path` AS upwardNamePath FROM `team` WHERE `uuid` in
#{item}
SELECT ut.`team_uuid` FROM `user_team` ut JOIN team t ON t.`uuid` = ut.`team_uuid` and t.`is_delete` = 0 WHERE ut.`user_uuid` = #{userUuid};
SELECT t.uuid, t.name, t.lft, t.rht FROM `user_team` ut JOIN team t ON t.`uuid` = ut.`team_uuid` and t.`is_delete` = 0 WHERE ut.`user_uuid` = #{userUuid};

SELECT t.uuid, t.name, t.lft, t.rht FROM `user_team` ut JOIN team t ON t.`uuid` = ut.`team_uuid` and t.`is_delete` = 0 WHERE ut.`user_uuid` in
#{userUuid}
SELECT a.`id`, a.`uuid`, a.`name`, a.`parent_uuid` AS parentUuid, a.`lft`, a.`rht` FROM `team` a WHERE a.`parent_uuid` = #{parentUuid} and a.`is_delete` = 0 ORDER BY a.`lft` ASC limit #{startNum}, 1

SELECT a.`team_uuid` AS teamUuid, a.`user_uuid` AS userUuid, a.`title`, b.`user_id` AS userId, b.`user_name` AS userName, (SELECT `user_info` from `user` WHERE `uuid` = a.`user_uuid`) as userInfo, (SELECT `vip_level` from `user` WHERE `uuid` = a.`user_uuid`) as userVipLevel FROM `user_team` a JOIN `team` t ON a.`team_uuid` = t.`uuid` and t.`is_delete` = 0 JOIN `user` b ON b.`uuid` = a.`user_uuid` WHERE a.`team_uuid` = #{value} ORDER BY a.`id`
select `uuid` from `team` where `name` = #{value} and `is_delete` = 0
select `id`, `uuid`, `name`, `parent_uuid` AS `parentUuid` from `team` where `name` = #{name} and `parent_uuid` = #{parentUuid}

SELECT tut.`team_uuid` AS teamUuid, u.`user_name` AS userName, u.`user_id` AS userId, u.`uuid` as userUuid, u.`user_info` AS userInfo, ut.`id` AS titleId, ut.`name` AS title FROM `team_user_title` tut LEFT JOIN `user` u ON tut.`user_uuid` = u.`uuid` LEFT JOIN `user_title` ut ON ut.`id` = tut.`title_id` where tut.`team_uuid` = #{value}

SELECT tut.`team_uuid` AS teamUuid, u.`user_name` AS userName, u.`user_id` AS userId, u.`uuid` AS userUuid, u.`user_info` AS userInfo, ut.`id` AS titleId, ut.`name` AS title FROM `team` t LEFT JOIN team_user_title tut ON t.`uuid` = tut.`team_uuid` LEFT JOIN `user` u ON tut.`user_uuid` = u.`uuid` LEFT JOIN `user_title` ut ON ut.`id` = tut.`title_id` WHERE tut.`title_id` = #{titleId} AND t.`lft` <= #{lft} AND t.`rht` >= #{rht} ORDER BY t.lft DESC
SELECT `team_uuid` AS teamUuid, `user_uuid` AS userUuid, `title_id` AS titleId FROM `team_user_title` WHERE `user_uuid` = #{value}
SELECT `uuid` FROM `team` WHERE `upward_name_path` = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `team` (`id`, `uuid`, `name`, `parent_uuid`, `lft`, `rht`, `level`, `upward_uuid_path`, `upward_name_path`, `is_delete`, `source`, `lcd`) VALUES (#{id}, #{uuid}, #{name}, #{parentUuid}, #{lft}, #{rht}, #{level}, #{upwardUuidPath}, #{upwardNamePath}, 0, #{source}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `name` = #{name}, `parent_uuid` = #{parentUuid}, `lft` = #{lft}, `rht` = #{rht}, `level` = #{level}, `upward_uuid_path` = #{upwardUuidPath}, `upward_name_path` = #{upwardNamePath}, `is_delete` = 0, `source` = #{source}, `lcd` = NOW()

INSERT INTO `team` (`id`, `uuid`, `name`, `parent_uuid`, `upward_uuid_path`, `upward_name_path`, `is_delete`, `source`, `lcd`) VALUES (#{id}, #{uuid}, #{name}, #{parentUuid}, #{upwardUuidPath}, #{upwardNamePath}, 0, #{source}, #{lcd}) on DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `name` = #{name}, `parent_uuid` = #{parentUuid}, `upward_uuid_path` = #{upwardUuidPath}, `upward_name_path` = #{upwardNamePath}, `is_delete` = 0, `source` = #{source}, `lcd` = #{lcd}
mapper.update: UPDATE `team` SET `is_delete` = 1 WHERE `source` = #{source} AND (`lcd` < #{lcd} OR `lcd` IS NULL)
